desc: Handcrafted Soy Candles made in Slinger, Wisconsin. Each candle is hand poured in small batches to ensure premium quality for our customers. We use only 100% soy wax and phthalate-free fragrance oils, along with clean burning wooden and cotton wicks.

layout.text: Handcrafted Soy Luxury Candles, Wax Melts, Soaps, and more.
